body.p:
State of Kentucky
McLean County } Sct

I Douglas Little Presiding Judge for McLean county do certify that William R.. Wilis ^Personally^ 2nd Lieut: appeared before me and took the following oath To Wit I William R. WIllis do solemnly Swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States and the constitution of Kentucky and will discharge all and singular the duties and services appertaining to the office of Second Lieutenant in the Volunteer Militia agreeably to the law and general regulations and will obey such orders and instructions as I shall from time to time receive from the proper officers Which is hereby certified to General head quarters.
Given under my hand at Calhoon Ky this 23rd November 1861

Douglas Little
P. J. McLean County
